name: Quickly, Quickly
description: '''Graham Jonson''' (born August 4, 2000), also known as '''Quickly, Quickly''', is an American musician and record producer. Based in [[Portland, Oregon]], he originally created instrumental beats on [[SoundCloud]]. In 2021, he signed to [[Ghostly International]] and has since released two studio albums under the label, ''The Long and Short of It'' in 2021 and ''I Heard That Noise'' in 2025.
